extract.description: Retrieve raw web content from specified URLs.

props.name: urls
props.description: The URLs you want to extract with Tavily.

props.name: include_images
props.description: Include a list of images extracted from the URLs in the response.

search.description: Search for data based on a query.

props.name: query
props.description: The search query you want to execute with Tavily.

props.name: search_depth
props.description: The depth of the search. It can be "basic" or "advanced".

props.name: topic
props.description: The category of the search. This will determine which of our agents will be used for the search.

props.name: days
props.description: The number of days back from the current date to include in the search results. Only available when using the "news" search topic. Default is 3.

props.name: time_range
props.description: The time range back from the current date to include in the search results.

props.name: max_results
props.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

props.name: include_images
props.description: Include a list of query-related images in the response.

props.name: include_image_descriptions
props.description: When include_images is set to True, this option adds descriptive text for each image.

props.name: include_answer
props.description: Include a short answer to original query, generated by an LLM based on Tavily\

props.name: include_raw_content
props.description: Include the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result.

props.name: include_domains
props.description: A list of domains to specifically include in the search results.

props.name: exclude_domains
props.description: A list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.
